channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Roadworks causing traffic all day, 16th January
item.description:
These roadworks started around 2-3 weeks ago and it has been causing traffic. Around August 2025 they added roadworks on that same road near the Ponders End asda and it didn't finish until the middle of December. The traffic was atrocious then and the roadworks finished. Then start of January 2026 the roadworks are back and have been causing so much traffic even the nightingale road bus stop is closed . And when you look at the progress the workers aren't working they are on their phones or doing anything but working. Please please please do something about this And ask them a date for finish.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, High Street, Ponders End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights so dirty couldn’t see when it was green, 16th January
item.description:
Trying to turn right from Westow street to Westow hill the sun was shining on the traffic lights and they were so dirty that I couldn’t tell if the light had turned green or not. It seems quite dangerous for that to be the case.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12-54, Central Hill, Upper Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole and very poor road surface in middle of road outside 210 Belmont Road DA81LQ, 16th January
item.description:
Pot hole has been there for some time and is getting larger and fills with rain water which would be dangerous should someone cross there and step into it. The road surface along the middle of the road is also deteriorating and cracking

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belmont Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street lights, 16th January
item.description:
There is no street light on the corner of Edmund Street and New Church Road (by Evalina Mansions). Coupled with no lights on the foot and bike path between Addington Square and New Church Road (right by the playground), this means that it’s incredibly dark in the evening and at night. It feels very unsafe, especially given the crime in and around Burgess Park.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 74, Edmund Street, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass on footpath, 16th January
item.description:
Several smashed glass bottles of wine on the cut-through between the north end of Rafford Way and Stockwell Close - from the smell at the scene the accident happened probably less than an hour ago.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Close, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree about to fall over, 16th January
item.description:
The tree is ripping out of the ground. This has been ongoing for ages. I complained last year and all they done was come and cut a couple of branches and removed 2 slabs, filling it with sand and stones. The tree has got progressively worse over the past couple of days, the roots are ripping out and the pavement is lifting. If this tree falls it is going seriously hurt someone and cause damage to vehicles parked or passing!! It needs to be removed asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Dartmouth Park Hill, Archway, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside No.9 Kingswood Avenue, 16th January
item.description:
Tree has caused kerb and paving to lift substantially. This is a severe tripping hazard to residents and damages cars. Residents at numbers 9 and 10 are elderly and disabled. This is causing a serious health and safety issue.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingswood Avenue, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outdoor pool abandoned in grassy area - collecting moss and killing grass, 16th January
item.description:
Previously reported pool remains abandoned on the communal grassy area. Would appreciate if it can be removed, as it is a health hazard and an eye sore.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kidbrooke Park Close, Kidbrooke
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes in most of the road, 16th January
item.description:
This road completely covered in potholes, it is very uncomfortable to drive on this road. I actually make an effort to avoid this road due to the potholes. It has been like this for years and I’m quite surprised this has not been repaired. Please can this have attention?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Peckham Park Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a pothole near the traffic light going towards great Dover street/old Kent road, 16th January
item.description:
This pothole has been there for two months and there are a few leading up to the traffic light. This is the traffic light that the bus 21 approaches after it has left the bus stop on old Kent road and approaches great Dover street bus stop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Kent Road, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
